title: Effectiveness Study of Simulation-Based Mobile Language Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Beginner-Level Proficiency in the Relevant Language
context.additional_context: A language job performance improvement program conducted in smartphone-based limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply context-specific language expressions with over 80% accuracy on a mobile platform utilizing simulation models.
Learners achieve statistically significant improvement (p<0.01) in language proficiency scores through pre-post test comparisons.
Learners engage in voluntary review activities over five times per week through microlearning modules.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
